top.value: What is your opinion on cancel culture?
Do you think freedom of speech should have limits? Explain.
Do you think people are too easily offended? Is this a new issue?
What is your opinion on social media? Is it doing more harm than good?
Should voting me mandatory? Do you vote?
What traditional values do you agree with?
Do you think traditions need to be respected?
Is religion more harmful or helpful to society?
Should public schools teach religion?
What are your opinions on cultural appropriation? For example, wearing certain hairstyles, garments, getting tribal tattoos, etc...
Should statues of controversial figures be removed?
What are your opinions on patriotism?
Are people more, less, or equally moral than they were 100 years ago?
Should billionaires exist? What level of wealth is too much? If you had to put a hard cap on wealth, what would it be?
What is your opinion on taxes? Are they used correctly?
What system of government do you think is best?
What do you think of eugenics? Does altering an infant's genes to reduce risk of disease, increase height, or even change eye color cross lines?
Should former presidents recieve lifelong security and benefits?
What age would you cap political candidates at?
Can a supreme ruler be a good thing?
How far should government surveillance be allowed to go? Should we cut back on it?
Are you more of a protest person, or a riot person? How far is too far with either?
When do you consider lying to be morally right? When is the last time you told a lie? Do you think you were correct for telling this lie?

cards.bottom: Whoever told a lie the last has to take a drink, or take a bite out of the oldest thing in the fridge.

top.value: Are humans naturally selfish? Explain.
Can you judge people of the past for the standards of their time? Explain.
Is morality subjective or objective?
Should intent matter more than outcome?
Are moral absolutes real? In other words, are there certain things that are always right, or always wrong?
Is it okay to judge people by their past? Give examples.
Should forgiveness always be encouraged? Do we forgive too much or too little?
Is it cowardly to be neutral in a moral debate?
Is monogamy natural?
Is it okay to spank children?
When is physical violence okay?
What's your opinion on multi-gendered bathrooms?
Are there any queer constructs, phrases, events, etc... that irk you?
Is representation in media authentic or forced? Does it matter?
Are stereotypes ever accurate?
Is college worth the cost?
Would wiping world debt be more beneficial or detrimental to society?
Is hustle culture toxic?
Are rich people morally obligated to give back?
Is working 40 hours a week outdated? What should a regular work week look like?
How many homes is too many? Are any landlords who rent out properties good?
Is success mostly luck?
What's your stance on slavery in prisons?
What do you think of giving jobs a notice before leaving? Have you ever walked out of a job?
Is AI a threat to humanity? Why or why not?
Should AI replace human jobs?
Is privacy already dead?
Are smartphones making us dumber?
How strictly should social media be regulated?
At what age should someone get unrestricted access to the internet?
Is online anonymity good or bad?
Are we too dependent on technology? Do you care?
Is veganism morally superior?
Should any substances (weed, alcohol, vapes, etc...) be banned?
Should prisons focus on rehabilitation or punishment? What crimes are beyond rehabilitation?
What execution method should be used for the death penalty?
Does the death penalty take too long? Is the death penalty acceptable?
Should judges be strict to the law?
What crimes should juveniles be sentenced to life for? Is any age too young?
Should juvenile records be wiped when they become adults?
Do humans actually have free will?

cards.bottom: The person who most shows their free will gets to make someone take a shot.

top.value: Is there a purpose to life?
Does meaning require suffering?
Is ignorance bliss?
Are trigger warnings necessary?
What do you think of tipping culture?
You get to put a hard cap on the number of humans alive. If it is less than the current population, random people are instantly killed so that the population fits your answer.
What is the worst thing you have ever done (that you are willing to share)?

cards.bottom: The most heartless answer gets to designate two shots to the group. You can split it up, or give them both to one person.

top.value: Have you ever intentionally committed a crime? Tell us the story!

cards.bottom: Everyone except for the biggest criminal drinks!

top.value: When was the last time you cried? What happened?
Have you ever made anyone else cry? What happened?
Have you ever stolen anything? What, and why? Do you still have it?
Describe a time you thought you were actually going to die?
Do you genuinely hate anybody for a non-political reason? What is the story?
What is a controversial opinion of yours?
What ethical boundaries are you happy to cross?
Let's clear the air. What's one thing you don't like about me?
Is there something that is difficult to talk about among any of us here? Do we want to talk about it now?
Are you struggling with something that we don't know about?
Who on earth do you think hates you the most right now?
If you were going to kill yourself, how would you do it?

cards.bottom: The most painful or public answer has to take a shot.

top.value: Do you ever think about suicide? How often? What keeps you going?
What's the most self-serving thing you have ever done?
Would you prefer death the be final, or would you like it to be a doorway to somewhere else? Does your idea of an afterlife stretch for eternity, and what are the implications of that?
What would you regret the most if you died today?
How do you want to die?
Have your parents ever done something that you will never forgive them for?
Have you ever been in an abusive relationship or friendship? What's the story?
What do you identify as politically? Do you actually share the views of the political party you side with?
What is a law you fundamentally disagree with?
What do you think about borders? Are they important, or should people be able to roam and live wherever they desire?
Have you ever seriously injured somebody? Who, and why?
What do you believe happens after death? What would your ideal after-death experience be, regardless of your beliefs?
What does our government owe to its people?
What should living with minimum wage pay look like?

cards.bottom: Drink if you make minimum wage.

top.value: Is morality universal, or shaped by culture? Give examples of morals in other cultures that you disagree with.
Would you forgive a former nazi who seems upset with who they were?
